actions.name: AddInstanceFleet
actions.description: Grants permission to add an instance fleet to a running cluster

actions.name: AddInstanceGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to add instance groups to a running cluster

actions.name: AddJobFlowSteps
actions.description: Grants permission to add new steps to a running cluster

actions.name: AddTags
actions.description: Grants permission to add tags to an Amazon EMR resource

actions.name: AttachEditor
actions.description: Grants permission to attach an EMR notebook to a compute engine

actions.name: CancelSteps
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel a pending step or steps in a running cluster

actions.name: CreateEditor
actions.description: Grants permission to create an EMR notebook

actions.name: CreatePersistentAppUI
actions.description: Grants permission to create a persistent application history server

actions.name: CreateRepository
actions.description: Grants permission to create an EMR notebook repository

actions.name: CreateSecurityConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to create a security configuration

actions.name: CreateStudio
actions.description: Grants permission to create an EMR Studio

actions.name: CreateStudioPresignedUrl
actions.description: Grants permission to launch an EMR Studio using IAM authentication mode

actions.name: CreateStudioSessionMapping
actions.description: Grants permission to create an EMR Studio session mapping

actions.name: DeleteEditor
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an EMR notebook

actions.name: DeleteRepository
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an EMR notebook repository

actions.name: DeleteSecurityConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a security configuration

actions.name: DeleteStudio
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an EMR Studio

actions.name: DeleteStudioSessionMapping
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an EMR Studio session mapping

actions.name: DeleteWorkspaceAccess
actions.description: Grants permission to block an identity from opening a collaborative workspace

actions.name: DescribeCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to get details about a cluster, including status, hardware and software configuration, VPC settings, and so on

actions.name: DescribeEditor
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about a notebook, including status, user, role, tags, location, and more

actions.name: DescribeJobFlows
actions.description: Grants permission to describe details of clusters (job flows). This API is deprecated and will eventually be removed. We recommend you use ListClusters, DescribeCluster, ListSteps, ListInstanceGroups and ListBootstrapActions instead

actions.name: DescribeNotebookExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about a notebook execution

actions.name: DescribePersistentAppUI
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a persistent application history server

actions.name: DescribeReleaseLabel
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about an EMR release, such as which applications are supported

actions.name: DescribeRepository
actions.description: Grants permission to describe an EMR notebook repository

actions.name: DescribeSecurityConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to get details of a security configuration

actions.name: DescribeStep
actions.description: Grants permission to get details about a cluster step

actions.name: DescribeStudio
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about an EMR Studio

actions.name: DetachEditor
actions.description: Grants permission to detach an EMR notebook from a compute engine

actions.name: GetAutoTerminationPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the auto-termination policy associated with a cluster

actions.name: GetBlockPublicAccessConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the EMR block public access configuration for the AWS account in the Region

actions.name: GetManagedScalingPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the managed scaling policy associated with a cluster

actions.name: GetOnClusterAppUIPresignedURL
actions.description: Grants permission to get a presigned URL for an application history server running on the cluster

actions.name: GetPersistentAppUIPresignedURL
actions.description: Grants permission to get a presigned URL for a persistent application history server

actions.name: GetStudioSessionMapping
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about an EMR Studio session mapping

actions.name: LinkRepository
actions.description: Grants permission to link an EMR notebook repository to EMR notebooks

actions.name: ListBootstrapActions
actions.description: Grants permission to get details about the bootstrap actions associated with a cluster

actions.name: ListClusters
actions.description: Grants permission to get the status of accessible clusters

actions.name: ListEditors
actions.description: Grants permission to list summary information for accessible EMR notebooks

actions.name: ListInstanceFleets
actions.description: Grants permission to get details of instance fleets in a cluster

actions.name: ListInstanceGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to get details of instance groups in a cluster

actions.name: ListInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to get details about the Amazon EC2 instances in a cluster

actions.name: ListNotebookExecutions
actions.description: Grants permission to list summary information for notebook executions

actions.name: ListReleaseLabels
actions.description: Grants permission to list and filter the available EMR releases in the current region

actions.name: ListRepositories
actions.description: Grants permission to list existing EMR notebook repositories

actions.name: ListSecurityConfigurations
actions.description: Grants permission to list available security configurations in this account by name, along with creation dates and times

actions.name: ListSteps
actions.description: Grants permission to list steps associated with a cluster

actions.name: ListStudioSessionMappings
actions.description: Grants permission to list summary information about EMR Studio session mappings

actions.name: ListStudios
actions.description: Grants permission to list summary information about EMR Studios

actions.name: ListWorkspaceAccessIdentities
actions.description: Grants permission to list identities that are granted access to a workspace

actions.name: ModifyCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to change cluster settings such as number of steps that can be executed concurrently for a cluster

actions.name: ModifyInstanceFleet
actions.description: Grants permission to change the target On-Demand and target Spot capacities for a instance fleet

actions.name: ModifyInstanceGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to change the number and configuration of EC2 instances for an instance group

actions.name: OpenEditorInConsole
actions.description: Grants permission to launch the Jupyter notebook editor for an EMR notebook from within the console

actions.name: PutAutoScalingPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update an automatic scaling policy for a core instance group or task instance group

actions.name: PutAutoTerminationPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update the auto-termination policy associated with a cluster

actions.name: PutBlockPublicAccessConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update the EMR block public access configuration for the AWS account in the Region

actions.name: PutManagedScalingPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update the managed scaling policy associated with a cluster

actions.name: PutWorkspaceAccess
actions.description: Grants permission to allow an identity to open a collaborative workspace

actions.name: RemoveAutoScalingPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to remove an automatic scaling policy from an instance group

actions.name: RemoveAutoTerminationPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to remove the auto-termination policy associated with a cluster

actions.name: RemoveManagedScalingPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to remove the managed scaling policy associated with a cluster

actions.name: RemoveTags
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from an Amazon EMR resource

actions.name: RunJobFlow
actions.description: Grants permission to create and launch a cluster (job flow)

actions.name: SetTerminationProtection
actions.description: Grants permission to add and remove termination protection for a cluster

actions.name: StartEditor
actions.description: Grants permission to start an EMR notebook

actions.name: StartNotebookExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to start an EMR notebook execution

actions.name: StopEditor
actions.description: Grants permission to shut down an EMR notebook

actions.name: StopNotebookExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to stop notebook execution

actions.name: TerminateJobFlows
actions.description: Grants permission to terminate a cluster (job flow)

actions.name: UnlinkRepository
actions.description: Grants permission to unlink an EMR notebook repository from EMR notebooks

actions.name: UpdateEditor
actions.description: Grants permission to update an EMR notebook

actions.name: UpdateRepository
actions.description: Grants permission to update an EMR notebook repository

actions.name: UpdateStudio
actions.description: Grants permission to update information about an EMR Studio

actions.name: UpdateStudioSessionMapping
actions.description: Grants permission to update an EMR Studio session mapping

actions.name: ViewEventsFromAllClustersInConsole
actions.description: Grants permission to use the EMR console to view events from all clusters
